component.name: T-Crisis 4 110% A.I. Turbo Remix
component.summary: JeZxLee's T-Crisis 4 110% A.I. Turbo Remix - C|NET Tribute Retail #3

description.p: This free Tetris game is exclusive to Linux. It's a sequel to the #1 smash hit "T-Crisis 100%" for Palm PDAs and smartphones. T-Crisis 4 110% A.I. Turbo Remix features great visuals, cool sound effects, and a pulse-pounding digital music soundtrack.

The game supports keyboard, mouse, and USB game controllers with excellent computer A.I. players, 4 player simultaneous local gameplay, and a rock-solid Tetris engine based on the original Gameboy version. You will absolutely love this free Tetris game for Linux.
Latest version of T-Crisis 4 110% A.I. Turbo Remix with improved Flatpak packaging and screenshot support
